1.content:
You where enjoying your self 1 week with no parents,no rules...

"Niall !!" And your annoying 11 year old brother to mind for the week.

You play a video game when your door flings open and John runs in a jumped onto your bed. 

"Niall,Niall can we play a game your brother jumped up and down with excitement.

You pause the game.
"Piss off I'm playing Xbox no go "

"Please one game come ooooooonnnn! PLEASE!"

"Fine"

"Yay! Lets play thought or dear!"

The game starts and goes on until your brother's request

"I dear you to lick my feet!" He says taking his socks off and wiggling his toes at your face. You do it  

After a couple of minute's his foot was getting bigger!  

"Oh my god i'm shrinking" you cry out, your brother that wasn't paying attention and you push him away.
"Wow bro, you're right, now you're as like me, that's so funny" he giggle "how did  this happend?" you say loudly "I don't know, maybe it was my feet, hihi" he says innocently, not knowing (for now) that she was right.

John is excited that you're now to him same height level, and he comes near you for measuring, and can see he's slightly taller with his hair gelled in spikes 

"Hahaha bro, i'm taller now, you're my LITTLE brother at the moment".

"Impossible, people don't shrink" you cry, and full of fear and anger you try to lift up your "little" brother (like you usually do when you play together), it's very hard, but you success, and laboriously put her on the couch "See? I'm still stronger than you" you say... I'm still shrinking!
1.title: Intro

11.content:
With your shirt around your knees puts you somewhere between two and a half to three feet tall, you guess. Looking up at your sibling, you can't believe your eyes. He now towers over you like you used to tower over him. He grins as he speaks again.

"Now let's see you try and stop my foot, little brother!" He raises his foot, now 1/3rd your size, as high as she can and tries to step on you. You almost try to catch the foot, but then you realize what that would mean. You opt instead for dodging. The foot just brushes your leg as you duck out of the way and start running away.

"Oh, no you don't, brother!" John chases after you. You have a much better conditioned body, but with his longer legs and height advantage, he catches up quickly. Just as he leans down to catch you, you turn out of the way. He almost loses balance, but catches himself and just gets upset. The chase continues, but as he catches up, instead, this time se just kicks you in the back. To you, it feels like being tackled from behind. You collapse on the ground and turn on your back just as your brother stands over you, with a smug smile on her face.

"Let's see how small you can get, brother!" He calls out gleefully. He stomps again. No time to dodge this one- you put out your arms, grab it with your hands, and try to push it away from you. All this time, you're praying to yourself. "Please don't let me get smaller, please, aren't I small enough? Don't tell me this day can get any worse, please, please..."

Your prayers fall on deaf ears, The flesh you're holding onto, as well as the carpet floor which you collapsed on, both begin to shift as the foot expands in front of you. Your Little brother giggles in excitement as the weight of the foot (which you're pretty sure he's buffeting) begins to steadily grow heavier, despite your efforts. You watch in despair as the foot grows outwards in all directions- what was once one-third your height is now one-half, then two-thirds, your entire body, and then completely covers you. You fight your way to a kneeling position beneath the balls of your brother's foot and keep pushing, but the weight and the foot it belongs to keeps growing, and growing, and growing...
11.title: Play Time!

111.content:
The flesh of the foot becomes moist and rigid- you're beginning to feel the curves in her footprint now as your back is now slightly less than the length of his soles, and still getting bigger. In a last attempt to free yourself from your Atlas-like position, you fling yourself out from under her foot and land on your stomach. Your brother, not expecting this, has his foot slam reflexively against the carpet behind you. Face into the rug, you pant and sweat at your labor so far, then roll on your back- and freeze.

High above you, your brother looks down in amazement. "Wow, brother, you really ARE tiny!" He exclaims in shock. Then that insidious grin shows up again. But I think there's room for more shrinking, don't you?"
111.title: You Shrink and Shrink

1111.content:
If you weren't out of breath, then you would tell her you certainly don't think so. His big toe could now cover your torso and then some. You were lucky if you were currently two inches tall. He bends down to pick you up, but you're too exhausted to run away. You couldn't do it before, you could hardly do it now, at your new size, after back-pressing for who knows how long, with who knows how much weight. Your limp body dangles as he takes you in his huge hand over to the couch. He sits down and puts his feet on the couch with him. You wonder what he's going to do now... and then you wish you had never asked when he lowers you with his hand and presses you against his foot, with your head poking out between the second and big toe.

"Smaller, smaller!" he cries out excitedly, as the big toe next to your face begins to grow once more from three times your head's size to something bigger still...
1111.title: Shrink Even Smaller!!!

11111.content:
Your brother presses you down into his gigantic toe to make you even smaller. Your body dwindles down in size, you are getting smaller and smaller by the second, while your John giggles at your predicament from above. You can feel his toe in front of you getting bigger and bigger and his finger on the back of you getting larger and larger. You have no idea what size you are. Just when you think you can't get much smaller your brother pulls you away from the toe.

You are lifted quickly up in the air and he sets you down in his palm....and it is enormous. You can't be more than 1/16th of an inch tall! His enormous face comes down to you. "Oh look at my itty bitty brother!" his voice thunders so loud that it almost hurts. You can't believe how small she made you!
11111.title: Smaller Still?

111111.content:
John smiled,and placed you back on the ground,his already massive toe pressing into your body."Please God.....he's not going to shrink me even more!!"You yell,but it happens anyway.

You closed your eyes,afraid of what was going to happen next.Shrinking smaller,and smaller,and smaller you became.

Suddenly,it stopped.

Slowly opening your eyes,fear crept into every part of your body.

Before you,stood your brother's toe.But it's size had drastically change.It stretched into the sky like a mountain.Your size,you guessed,was probably around 1/32th of an inch tall,where John would need to squint her eyes to even barely see you.

In a blur,you were swept up into his hand,and his astronomical face sneered down at you."Your even smaller than before,But still not small enough!!"His voice booms out shaking you to the core.
111111.title: Still not Small enough!

1111111.content:
John seemed to have an obssesion now,just to make you smaller.He looked at your speck body,and a evil glint seemed to appear in his big brown eyes.
In a blur,John placed you back on the floor against his mountain-sized toe."Smaller,smaller,smaller,SMALLER!!"He boomed from above,as if possesed.

His tanned  feet began to do their thing.

You found yourself shrinking even more,John's toe becoming even larger than a mountain,his face so high above becoming even higher,and your world becoming infinitely huge.You just closed your eyes,hoping and willing it all away.The last thing you heard before blacking out was John chanting."Smaller,smaller,smaller,smaller.........
1111111.title: Even Smaller Still!

11111111.content:
Your eyes fluttered open for a moment,the you stood up,your whole body sore."Gah....what happened?"You ask yourself groggily.Then the vents of the past few hours hit you.John had shrunk you to an even smaller size,and you had no idea how small you really were!!

You were inside a hole,the walls feeling like skin,and an overpowering smell of feet filled your nostrils.You walked to the opening of the hole,trying to get your bearings.

It all came at you like a bullet train.

Stretching out in front of you,was a wasteland of fabric.In reality,it was just a strand of carpet fiber.Looking to your left and right,walls of flesh seemed to stretch on all directions.Your new size finally settled in.It was scary.

You were small enough to fit into a pore on John's toe.

Suddenly,an earthquake cause you to fall to the floor.It was phenomenonal,it would stagger beyond the measurment of the richter scale.

Would this happen EVERY time your bro moved his foot?!Life at your new microscopic size would be hell.A astronomical-proportioned wall of glass appeared in front of your.You had no idea what it was.

What was actually happening,John had put a magnifying glass to his toe,so he could get a look at you."Oh my gosh!Your sooooo small!I need this magnifying glass just to barely seen you,brother!"Sean booms out,his voice shaking everything to it's core,and you rather felt it than heard it.

Considering it,John would be like a cosmic being,a
 Giga-sized to your tiny body just a single  pore in his toe could be a home for you.

choices: Run for your micro sized life!
1111111111.content:
You look out in fear at the magnifying glass and, looking around, you can't help but start panicking as you see nothing but toe flesh in all directions. You became so small your field of vision cannot reach beyond his toe, giving you the illusion of being totally surrounded by nothing but her toe.

"I guess now you're the little sibling, brother." says your brother, giggling and thinking nothing of how insignificantly small he made you.

Suddenly, you start feeling a tingle all over your body again. You stop in time and notice you are shrinking even more, and then it hits you.

You're STILL on your brother's foot!

If you don't get out of his toe, you're going to keep shrinking endlessly, because you'll always remain in his foot. The way you see it, there are only two ways to react: you either test your luck running out of his pore and throwing yourself to the carpet, hoping you'll survive the fall, or remain still, praying that your brother will take you out of the pore or that, somehow, hid feet power disappear!

You realize you have little time to make the decision, since, the longer you wait, the smaller you get...

So, what do you do?

Something soft..sweaty...and a big pink. Surrounding you is that familiar pungent foot oder from before, but much stronger. 11111111112.content:
Staying here was never an option! Your arms pumped as you ran, your lungs burning with the exertion and the heady scent of your brother's feet as you sprinted as quickly as you could across his toe, only vaguely aware of your surroundings ever so slowly expanding around you. Your destination, the 'horizon' seemed to get further away every second, a seemingly impossible goal, but just when you were about to give up hope, your brother's foot shifted.

"Shifted" of course, seems like an understatement at this scale. It was tectonic activity like the world had never before seen as his foot scuffed across the dingy blue carpeting in his bedroom, trying to watch his "little" big brother as best he can, but it was sufficent enough to throw you forwards, launching you headlong into the abyss.

You plummeted off the sheer cliff face of his toe, an endless plain of blue and gray stretching out beneath you as you, thankfully, fell rather slowly to the carpeting, drifting like a snowflake on the wind, your body so pathetically tiny and weightless that even your brother's breath would be enough to send you flying for what would seem like miles.

Still, that doesn't make the landing seem any softer when you crash into that single thread of carpet, getting rugburn over every inch of your exposed skin as you skid to a stop, panting for breath.

Instinctively, you turn your head to look upwards as your brother speaks, his voice a low, subsonic rumble that's almost impossible to make out over the sound of your own heart thudding in your ears, as his foot casts you in a shadow, rising high over your head.

What does he have planned now?
11111111112.title: Run for your micro sized life!

choices: John's foot lifts away, with you stuck to his sole!
John's foot lifts away, leaving you microscopically tiny in the carpet!
111111111121.content:
John's voice was nothing but thunder at this scale, but even still a pattern could be recognized. He was saying a single word with two syllables over and over; a chant you'd heard before you passed out.

"Smaller."

It's the last thing you heard before the underside of your brother's sole filled your vision, the wrinkles of the underside of his foot offering you precious little reprieve as his full weight descended on the single strand of carpet you lay upon. Any softness or comfort the carpet may have offered at any point had been negated by your sheer scale, it was like lying on a felled tree that was wrapped in sandpaper and you could feel the 'grit' expanding outwards against your back as your face pressed into your brother's expanding sole once more.

You held your breath out of sheer instinct, trying in vain to push away, to roll off the carpet and vanish into the plush, but even as you braced your hands against his sole you knew it was hopeless. All you could do was hope that, when he moved his foot away, you'd still be large enough to manage to escape into the jungle of the carpet long enough to think of a way to somehow regain your size.

Assuming it was even possible.

John's foot hovered on you for another few seconds, shrinking you even closer to microscopic size. There was no way in telling how big you were now. You could only compare yourself to the size of things around you. Your galaxy-sized brother moved his foot away and stopped his chant. There was no point in trying to communicate with him. He was far too big to hear you. You sat there on the strain of carpet, desperate to find a way to stop your brother and return to normal size.

Your brother moved away from you for a moment, if you were going to escape from his sight, now was the time. You stood up on your strand of blue carpet, and looked over it. It was a long fall, but the fall you just had from John's foot to where you stood now was much bigger. You took a deep breath a jumped down into the forest that was your brother's bedroom carpet. You fell until you finally reached the base of the strands. They towered over you, and it was rather dark where you stood. It was difficult for light to reach you, considering all the stands of carpet that towered over you. You just hoped that from here, your brother would no longer be able to shrink you. You were small enough!

You ventured the the forest of carpet stands, and while you did you wondered what you were going to do. You were microscopic, navigating your way through a carpet! How were you ever going to get back to normal?

What happened next?

11111111112122.content:
You curl up, hugging your knees to your chest, rocking back and forth between the towering cedars of blue carpet strands. This was so insane! A moment ago... you'd been a living breathing human! The older brother! The guy in charge! Now... You're brother had stripped all that away from you, rubbed his feet on you for a couple minutes, and reduced you to the point where he resembled a galaxy sized god. Not just him; Everyone. Everyone at school, everyone of your friends.... You'd just become a microbe! Lost in a few strands of carpet! How could you possibly fix this...?

As you began panicking, you noticed something.... waaaaay above. A shadow, like an enormous, world encompassing cloud, descended on your surroundings. Your teeth chatter as you imagine what that impossibly powerful, looming presence might be... you can't see anything through the cracks of light between strands of fiber. That's when... seemingly out of no where... A massive, planet sized black sphere, with a brown ring around its edge, dominates what little bit of sky you can see. It takes you some time to finally realize that this alien, divine sighting is actually your brother's pupil... millions of times larger than you, just by itself! And it was fixed on you, staring at you in the carpet fibers. You want to scream as you realize what has happened. No..! No smaller! Please!

A long, silver, glittering skyscraper descends towards you, backed by even more metal. You struggle to figure what it is you're looking at... before realizing its the tip of a pair of silver tweezers, reaching out to pick you up...! You try to flee, but your brother pinches you up, the metal clamping over your entire body... you being just small enough so they can hold you, but not crush you.

You can hardly understand what's going on, but through the galactic sheets of planetary metal, down below you, you can see the familiar color of your brother's tanned feet, covering the floor. That familiar, potent, overwhelming, all encompassing, horrific smell fills the air in an instant, making your eye's water, and practically choking you with it's thickness. Just being near your brother's feet is practically enough to kill you... even if it didn't have this strange, absurd power, to endlessly humilate, and belittle you, turning you slowly to less than nothing.

The tweezers pull apart, and you can hear a deep, powerful vibration in the air, as you fall helplessly through the air, towards your brother's deadly sole. You can't hear what he's saying, not even a syllable, all you can hear is a bassy noise, but you still can feel the intent.

'Smaller.'

You can hear the thunder that is his voice, you can't understand him at your size, but you can understand what that means.

You are nothing.
